name: DraftWise
headline: Contract and negotiation AI built for lawyers
description: DraftWise is on a mission to transform the legal industry by harnessing the power of AI. With AI-powered drafting and negotiation software, DraftWise arms lawyers with data-driven intelligence that drastically improves the complete contract workflow, from first draft to client win.

founders.name: Emre Ozen, Founder/CTO
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CTO @ DraftWise 

 ex-Palantir | Cybersecurity | Data-Intensive Applications | Enterprise Software

# Contract and Negotiation AIPowered by your precedent.
Connecting lawyers with their best language for faster, more accurate contracts.
[Schedule a Demo](https://www.draftwise.com/<>)
[Contact Us](https://www.draftwise.com/</contact>)
Trusted by leading attorneys at Vault 10, Magic Circle, and AM Law 100 firms
![Orrick logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0a68eccbd32f5cb05c9d3_orrick-logo-rgb%202.svg)
![Katten Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/67a69b6e63b9a2b65635aa96_Katten-logo-homepage-svg-2.svg)
![Gunderson Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0a68eeee554c462c1c30f_Gunderson.svg)
![Womble Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0a68edad87c3968769a07_Womble.svg)
![Chapman Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0a68fb1a584bc2498c84f_logo-chapman%201.svg)
![Mishcon de Raya Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0a68e0d37c93e2bbb9a4c_MdR-Logotype_WHT%201.svg)
![Maddocks Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/67a69b8bc6689242644b5b44_Maddocks-2.svg)
![Bronstein Zilberberg Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/67a69b14dcb6ce82ee52da79_Bronstein.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/6669abdd330d75883d6c591c_Alcogal.png)
![Instacart Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/67a69ae4dcb6ce82ee52b163_Instacart.svg)
## Draft
Put your tedious drafting tasks on autopilot. Let DraftWise reference past deals to quickly and effectively generate first markup revisions of any contract.
## Review
Connect your lawyers with their best language. Search deal history, compare clauses, and instantly redline – directly inside Microsoft Word and Outlook.
## Negotiate
Surface critical insights to understand “what is market” and reference what opposing counsel previously accepted to ensure comprehensive negotiation tactics at every deal stage.
## Instantly Collect Relevant Precedent in a Single Document
## Empower Attorneys with Historical Firm Knowledge
## Reduce Low-Value Administrative Work 
## Built to the highest security standards
A commitment to excellence in data security is ingrained into our culture. We are [SOC 2 Type 2 compliant](https://www.draftwise.com/<https:/security.draftwise.com/>) among other security certifications.
![AI technology](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0aaa4d41b79a2bb750a4f_AI%20Technology.svg)
## Meet the innovative DraftWise AI platform
DraftWise is the only AI solution that empowers transactional lawyers through every stage of their process - from contract drafting to negotiation – using the breadth of your deal history. Effortlessly tackle complex agreements at scale, keeping your team laser-focused on more strategic work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0764698575ed8f7f9799b_Unlock%20Your%20Data.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f08a791c285ad0a0a9e343_DMS.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f08a79504a36f5a8adb6cb_Database.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f08a7933b2cc21f901e79f_CRM.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f0764698575ed8f7f9799b_Unlock%20Your%20Data.svg)
## Your deal history at your fingertips
With DraftWise, access your best language, precedent, and client-preferred positions instantly, through a secure DMS integration, auto-generated playbooks, or simply uploading a reference document, right in Microsoft Word and Outlook.
## Actionable recommendations – powered by your data
DraftWise’s advanced search, recommendation, and chat features enable you to find the right clause or definition quickly and effectively. Insert smart recommendations based on your deal history, easing the redline process from start to finish.
![Leverage knowledge logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f07a856a1c4badc84b06be_Leverage-Cropped-V3.svg)
## Empowering every lawyer with the knowledge of many
DraftWise facilitates secure, easy content sharing by promoting clause banks, know-how precedents, and playbooks. Every lawyer on your team will achieve greater ROI from the entire firm or organization’s existing work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65f1aea2968b97fbd78efba0_Share%20Expertise.svg)
"DraftWise has been a valuable innovation partner since we began our journey to transform the M&A process several years ago. The lastest GenAI tool set makes for an even more powerful platform. Fully integrated into our deal workflow by Orrick Labs, it enables our deal teams to spot issues faster and seamlessly implement redlines based on deal history. We look forward to continuing to innovate together as we identify new use cases and client solutions."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/6666dfd7fb6d20b7a8dc6a9d_Vedika.jpeg)
**Vedika Mehera**
Director of Orrick Labs at Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecd3_orrick.png)
"DraftWise will save our attorneys and the entire deal team hundreds of hours by enabling them to tap data and spot trends with incredible speed and accuracy. That adds up to more efficient client service and it also makes work better by enabling our team to focus on areas where they can add strategic value. We also see use cases for DraftWise precedent features beyond contracting."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecc6_wendy-curtis.webp)
**Wendy Curtis**
Chief Innovation Officer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecd3_orrick.png)
“The ease with which our attorneys could quickly build an accessible, sharable knowledge collection based on prior work was something we had not seen so well executed—until now. Powerful search capabilities in DraftWise mean our best contract language is quickly obtainable and easily actionable, inside Word at the time of drafting—where and when lawyers need it most.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548eca8_bill-koch.webp)
**Bill Koch**
Chief Knowledge & Innovation Officer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ece2_womble.png)
“It definitely saves time, but it is not just about that. It is about quality of our product—of the drafting we’re doing. DraftWise helps the lawyer draft better and faster.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecc5_oliver-neasham.webp)
**Oliver Neasham**
Senior Associate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecd1_mishcon.png)
“DraftWise is another pillar in our suite of practice innovations and client solutions. Our attorneys—who handle more corporate transactions for fast-moving venture-backed companies than any other law firm in the world—were clamoring for a tool that would allow them to better leverage that knowledge earned at the negotiating table. DraftWise is exactly the right solution for that need.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecc4_naveen-pai.webp)
**Naveen Pai**
Director of Knowledge Management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec53/65394cd657be00518548ecd2_gunderson.png)
### Latest News
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec79/6706760ce0c62ae9e625e9c2_Blog%20Thumbs.png)](https://www.draftwise.com/</news/announcing-draftwise-is-now-collaborating-with-cohere>)[October 9, 2024](https://www.draftwise.com/</news/announcing-draftwise-is-now-collaborating-with-cohere>)###### [Announcing: DraftWise is now collaborating with Cohere](https://www.draftwise.com/</news/announcing-draftwise-is-now-collaborating-with-cohere>)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65394cd657be00518548ec79/666aa13acf9ad78f135df438_Markup%20Announcement.png)](https://www.draftwise.com/</news/draftwise-introduces-markup>)[June 13, 2024](https://www.draftwise.com/</news/draftwise-introduces-markup>)###### [DraftWise Introduces Markup](https://www.draftwise.com/</news/draftwise-introduces-markup>)
[View All](https://www.draftwise.com/</news>)

generated_description:
### DraftWise: Transforming Legal Agreements with AI

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch, DraftWise operates out of New York with a dedicated team of 28 professionals. The company's mission is clear: to revolutionize the legal industry using AI-powered solutions designed specifically for lawyers. They provide an innovative software platform that streamlines contract drafting and negotiation, enhancing every step of the legal workflow from initial drafts to successful outcomes.

**What They Do**  
DraftWise offers a comprehensive AI solution that assists transactional lawyers at every stage of their process. Here’s how it affects the daily grind:

- **Drafting**: Automates tedious drafting tasks by referencing past agreements to produce quick initial markup revisions.
- **Review**: Allows lawyers to connect with optimized language, comparing clauses and redlining directly within tools like Microsoft Word and Outlook.
- **Negotiation**: Provides insights to help lawyers understand market standards and reference past negotiations for strategic decision-making.

The platform emphasizes security, maintaining high standards such as SOC 2 Type 2 compliance—an essential aspect for anyone working with sensitive legal data.

**Why DraftWise?**  
The platform is designed to empower lawyers by providing instant access to a firm’s language and precedent. With functionalities that promote content sharing and enable historical knowledge utilization, every team member can leverage the collective wisdom of the firm.

**Notable Features**  
- **Seamless Integrations**: DraftWise connects with various Document Management Systems (DMS) to enhance data search precision, making the experience efficient across platforms.
- **Data-Driven Insights**: Advanced search features recommend clauses based on previous deals, enabling faster redlining and decisions.
- **Enterprise-Grade Security**: Committing to security helps build trust, crucial in the legal sector.

**Client Success Stories**  
Leading law firms like Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP have reported significant improvements in the efficiency and accuracy of their legal processes since incorporating DraftWise. Clients describe it as a transformative tool that not only saves time but also enhances the quality of legal drafting.

**Conclusion**  
DraftWise stands out in the crowded legal tech space by combining cutting-edge generative AI with deep legal expertise. If you're in the legal field and tired of the inefficiencies in contract drafting and negotiations, DraftWise might just be the tool to supercharge your practice. 

To learn more or request a demo, visit their [website](https://www.draftwise.com/).
